nodes.title: SWE Landing Page
nodes.prompt: Create a landing page tailored for Software Engineers, showcasing relevant features and content.
nodes.what: A landing page for Software Engineers.
nodes.how: Structure the page with sections like hero, features, testimonials, and footer.

children.title: Hero Section
children.prompt: Design a hero section with a headline, subheadline, and call-to-action button.

children.title: Features Section
children.prompt: Create a section highlighting key features with icons and descriptions.

children.title: Footer Section
children.prompt: Design a footer with navigation links, social media icons, and copyright information.

nodes.title: Hero Section
nodes.prompt: Design a hero section with a headline, subheadline, and call-to-action button.
nodes.what: A hero section with headline, subheadline, and call-to-action.
nodes.how: The hero section prominently displays a headline, subheadline, and a call-to-action button to engage users.

children.title: Call-to-Action Button
children.prompt: Design a call-to-action button for the hero section.

nodes.title: Key Features Section
nodes.prompt: Create a section highlighting key features with icons and descriptions.
nodes.what: A section showcasing key features with icons and descriptions.
nodes.how: This section includes multiple feature cards, each with an icon and a description to highlight product benefits.

children.title: Feature Card
children.prompt: Design a feature card with an icon and description.

nodes.title: Footer Section
nodes.prompt: Design a footer with navigation links, social media icons, and copyright information.
nodes.what: A footer section with navigation links, social media icons, and copyright info.
nodes.how: The footer includes navigation links for site sections, social media icons for engagement, and copyright text for legal compliance.

children.title: Navigation Links
children.prompt: Create navigation links for the footer.

children.title: Social Media Icons
children.prompt: Design social media icons for the footer.

nodes.title: Call-to-Action Button
nodes.prompt: Design a call-to-action button for the hero section.
nodes.what: A button designed to drive user action.
nodes.how: The button should be visually prominent and styled to match the hero section.

nodes.title: Feature Card
nodes.prompt: Design a feature card with an icon and description.
nodes.what: A card showcasing a feature with an icon and description.
nodes.how: The card should include an icon, a title, and a brief description.

nodes.title: Footer Navigation Links
nodes.prompt: Create navigation links for the footer.
nodes.what: A set of links for navigating the site from the footer.
nodes.how: The links should be styled to fit the footer and include hover effects.

nodes.title: Social Media Icons
nodes.prompt: Design social media icons for the footer.
nodes.what: A set of icons linking to social media platforms.
nodes.how: The icons should be styled to match the footer and include hover effects.
